node.title: Director, Legal Aid Clinic
node.name: Mohamed Abokor Mohamed
node.description: Clinical Director who is based at Legal Clinic Office at Law college who will be responsible for the day-to-day overall coordination, management and supervision of the clinic’s work and staff.

content.value:
) of Somaliland is a statutory body established by the Legal Aid early in 2002 and become operational in 2003. The objective of the Legal Aid is to render or make available, counseling, advice and legal representation to pro poor people  residing within the boundary of Somaliland as contemplated in the Constitution of the Republic of Somaliland, which affords every citizen access to justice.
The Office of the Clinic is situated in the University of Hargeisa, under the umbrella of College of law legal aid clinic. However, in regard to the present situation of Somaliland whereby peace and stability are prevailing, it is also paramount to strengthening the rule of law.

The aid clinic provides assistance to economically disadvantaged individuals within the boundaries of Somaliland. However, the legal clinic provides legal service on the matters that fall within the legal arena of criminal law civil law, human rights, and access to justice and child and women unit. Through this clinical work, students are expected  to improve their skills in respect to interviewing, counseling, and mediation skills, and research writing skills.

The legal aid clinic has remarked very significant achievement towards promoting rule of law within boundary of Somaliland and enhancing access to justice at gross root level. Particularly for the poor people and students of the college of law.

node.visionDescription: A just Somaliland in which the rights enshrined in our constitution are promoted, respected, defended, protected and fulfilled to ensure justice for all.”
node.missionDescription: To be a leading provider of quality legal services, ensuring effective access to justice for the poor and vulnerable law faculty students, in an independent manner
node.valueDescription: Dedication;   Commitment;   Professionalism;   Teamwork and integrity.
node.coreValueDescription: Excellence and Professionalism Respect for human dignity Integrity, Efficiency and Effectiveness  Accountability , Empowerment, Transparency , And high integrity of professional ethics.

node.title: Legal Aid Clinic Beneficiaries
